entry.value: library(plyr)%%00010library(flowCore)%%00010data <- read.table(knime.flow.in[["output_file"]], sep = " " , skip = 1)%%00010data_renamed <- rename(data, c("V1" = "2D.Dim1.NeRV", "V2" = "2D.Dim2.NeRV"))%%00010new.cols <- data_renamed[1:2]%%00010dir.create(paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/", "NeRV", sep = ""))%%00010fcs <- read.FCS(knime.flow.in[["Location"]])%%00010channel_number <- ncol(fcs) + 1;%%00010channel_id <- paste("$P", channel_number, sep="");%%00010channel_name <- "2D.Dim1.NeRV";%%00010channel_range <- max(new.cols[,1]) + 1;%%00010plist <- matrix(c(channel_name, channel_name, channel_range, 0, channel_range - 1));%%00010rownames(plist) <- c("name", "desc", "range", "minRange", "maxRange");%%00010colnames(plist) <- c(channel_id);%%00010channel_number2 <- ncol(fcs) + 2;%%00010channel_id2 <- paste("$P", channel_number2, sep="");%%00010channel_name2 <- "2D.Dim2.NeRV";%%00010channel_range2 <- max(new.cols[,2]) + 1;%%00010plist2 <- matrix(c(channel_name2, channel_name2, channel_range2, 0, channel_range2 - 1));%%00010rownames(plist2) <- c("name", "desc", "range", "minRange", "maxRange");%%00010colnames(plist2) <- c(channel_id2);%%00010params <- parameters(fcs);%%00010pd <- pData(params);%%00010pd <- rbind(pd, t(plist), t(plist2));%%00010pData(params) <- pd;%%00010out_data <- cbind(exprs(fcs), "2D.Dim1.NeRV" = new.cols[,1], "2D.Dim2.NeRV" = new.cols[,2]);%%00010out_frame <- flowFrame(out_data, params, description = description(fcs));%%00010write.FCS(out_frame, paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/NeRV/", knime.flow.in[["basename"]], sep = ""), what="numeric")%%00010knime.out <- as.data.frame(out_data)%%00010unlink(paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/NeRV_Input", sep = ""), recursive = TRUE, force = TRUE)%%00010unlink(paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/NeRV_Output", sep = ""), recursive = TRUE, force = TRUE)%%00010%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
